institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 18 (Subject to Appeals)
contents: Article 18 (Object of objection) ① An objection may be filed in any of the following cases: 1. When there is clear evidence of unfair execution of the game by the executive committee, 2. When there is misconduct by participating players 3. When there is clear evidence of unfair evaluation and scoring. ② The Korean Commission or the city/provincial committee shall file an objection with the Vice-Chairman of Technology regarding the following items that are not based on grounds and lack objectivity among the objections pursuant to paragraph 1. You can listen to the opinions of the relevant division head, head of review, deputy head of review, and reviewers and respond to them in writing. 1. Request for re-grading or confirmation of work, 2. Content regarding grading method and appropriateness of scores, 3. Content regarding the unique authority of the examiner and judges, 4. Content not based on other sufficient grounds.
